data.message: Cant believe its not coming anywhere near the West Midlands or staffordshire very disappointed :(

replies.message: I live on the Walsall/Cannock border so am with you in your disappointment.  A multi-billion pound corporation can't even squeeze in just one stop in either Birmingham, Wolverhampton, Cannock, Walsall, Stafford, West Bromwich, even Stoke or Coventry, in fact anywhere within that 50-60 mile radius. Crazy
Sara its crazy I would happily travel to most of the area's you have names but to miss us out completely, whats that all about :P
